author: Lauren Santander
title: Vision-e Updates the eCoach Platform, a Sales Script Building Solution that Enables Uniform Sales Training and Compliance
text:
Vision-e announced a new release for eCoach, a sales productivity platform that builds intelligent sales scripts on the cloud. eCoach allows managers to create custom scripts used by inside sales, outside sales, telemarketing, customer service and other team members. eCoach now offers updates to its dependency rules and search functionalities. With the ability to create more sophisticated dependency rules, eCoach allows for all types of organizations and businesses to create custom scripts that capture their individual business needs. The updated search functionality allows for scripts to be associated with a business’ Leads or Contacts objects within Salesforce.
Jule Limoli, Chief Executive Officer of Vision-e, said the new features are part of the company’s continuing efforts to innovate and help its customers with their sales processes. “The powerful new eCoach features will not only help train new employees on any call, it also helps seasoned representatives ask the right series of questions on every call,” Limoli says. “With eCoach, it’s like you have your best sales rep on every call.”
To request an eCoach professional demonstration, visit the Vision-e website at http://www.visione.com/ecoach .
About Vision-e:
Vision-e is a Salesforce ISV partner and provider of sales solutions that helps businesses of all sizes and budgets streamline their organization to become more productive, efficient and profitable. Founded by sales professionals who believe customers come first, no matter what, Vision-e provides one-of-a-kind business productivity applications and customized, enterprise services from certified Administrators.
For more information on Vision-e, go to http://www.Visione.com or call 1-888-611-2679. Vision-e is headquartered in Fairfield, NJ.
